name: Dirt Bike 3D Free
description:
Dirt Bike is back and has been completely revamped. A remake of the classic Dirt Bike game from FOG which changed the online bike game world forever has finally had an update and hit the world of mobile.
With all the original level and 4 new ones you will sure to love this new version, Dirt Bike 3D. Be taken back a few year to the classic feel of a dirtbike game where it's a game of skill and not just about clicking the forward button until you're finished.
Can you complete all 20 levels? We shall soon see.
